site.title: Zedino
site.description: We transform your business into a website, Mobile App, and Web App! ZEDINO, the Technical Web Agency, your partner in the virtual world.

caroussel.title: Your business online
caroussel.text: Zedino is a Web Agency specializing in website and mobile application creation

caroussel.title: More than a website, your business
caroussel.text: Secure e-commerce sites (https) </br> Secure online booking sites (https) </br> Mobile applications </br> Maintenance ...

presentation.text: Web Agency, our team masters digital communication strategies and supports you in creating your websites and mobile applications. Technical development experts, we offer you customized turnkey solutions.

Needs analysis and advice, UX, design, development, as well as, SEO, inbound marketing; we cover all the needs related to your digital project, then, we ensure its hosting, monitoring, and maintenance throughout its use.

services_details.title: Development
services_details.text: We tackle all technical challenges. Consult us!

services_details.title: Showcase Website
services_details.text: Imagine, create, and promote your website.

services_details.title: E-commerce
services_details.text: Turnkey shop to manage and sell your products.

services_details.title: Mobile App
services_details.text: Your presence on Play Store and App Store.

services_details.title: Responsive Web Design
services_details.text: Responsive Web Design, compatible with all devices.

services_details.title: Maintenance
services_details.text: Hosting, monitoring, and maintenance with a 6-hour response time.

services_details.title: Newsletter
services_details.text: Creation and tracking of your newsletter campaigns.

technologies_description: We use modern and proven technologies to ensure quality solutions.

projects.title: Project 1: Web application
projects.description: Development of a web application for the company Qualicolis

projects.title: Project 2: LMS
projects.description: Development of an LMS for the Itecom art school

projects.title: Project 3: Training management platform
projects.description: Development of a management platform for a training center

google_reviews_title: What our clients say on Google Reviews

reviews.text: Professional, responsive, and attentive team. I recommend Zedino's services.
Very satisfied with our collaboration with Zedino in Paris for the development of our web application. High-quality work, responsive and professional team. I highly recommend their services!
Excellent experience with Zedino in Paris for the development of our mobile application. Fast, professional, and quality service. Very satisfied with the final result. I highly recommend it!
Very satisfied with the work done. I recommend Zedino's services.
Fast service, but could be improved in some aspects.

partners_description: We collaborate with top-tier partners to offer the best solutions to our clients. Our partner network allows us to stay at the forefront of technology and offer innovative services tailored to the needs of each client.
clients_description: We are proud to work with prestigious clients and provide services that meet their high expectations. Our goal is to build strong and lasting relationships with each of our clients.

services.title: Value for our clients
services.description: Zedino is a proven player in application and business software development. We are experts in team extension among your collaborators, AgileSquads, and IT consulting services.

service_cards.title: Team Reinforcement
service_cards.description:
- Team extensions : Our talented technical team becomes an extension of your team, saving you time and resources on recruitment and integration.
- Long-term development: our team invests as much in the success of your project as your own team.

service_cards.title: AgileSquads
service_cards.description:
- Smart delegation : no need to assign internal staff to create a project from scratch.
- Faster results: with the AgileSquads approach, short interactions ensure that each stage of your project is implemented on time.
- Transparency and control : it is easy to convey requirements to a ready-to-go AgileSquad and periodically check the progress.

service_cards.title: IT Consulting
service_cards.description:
- Strategy development : Get the help you need to translate your business goals into technology plans before forming your team.
- Situation assessment : Get a second opinion on the challenges you face and recommendations to move forward.
- Prepare to partner : We can help you define a project in a way that allows you to work with a technology partner on your software development needs.

profiles.title: Our profiles
profiles.description: We offer you a whole squad of expert profiles in perfect alignment with your needs and fully product-oriented.

members.name: BackEnd Developer
members.description: There's definitely an API for that!üñ•Ô∏è

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We cover all aspects of the software engineering process, starting with your strategy. So, while we design, develop, and support your software products, you can focus on your core business.
approach.content: Our approach is client-centered, with tailored solutions.

points.title: Analysis and conceptualization
points.description: Analysis, design, and mockup creation for custom solutions.

points.title: Design and development
points.description: Appropriate technologies and development with real-time monitoring.

points.title: Efficiency and Performance
points.description: Optimization of your systems for better performance.

points.title: Promotion and maintenance
points.description: SEO/SEA optimization, social media training, hosting, and guaranteed maintenance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can reach us at any time, we will help you find the right human and technical solution for your project.

content.introduction: In accordance with the provisions of Articles 6-III and 19 of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004, on Confidence in the Digital Economy, known as L.C.E.N., users and visitors of the Zedino website are informed of the present legal notice.

These elements are protected by French and international laws relating to intellectual property. Any reproduction, distribution, modification, adaptation, retransmission, or publication of these elements is strictly prohibited without the prior written consent of Zedino. Their use without prior authorization exposes the offender to legal action.

Any total or partial reproduction of these trademarks or logos, carried out using elements of the site without the express authorization of Zedino or their owners, is therefore prohibited under Article L.713-2 of the Intellectual Property Code.

However, Zedino cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or relevance of the information presented on this site, whether provided by Zedino or by third-party partners. Consequently, Zedino disclaims all liability for any inaccuracies, errors, or omissions in this information as well as for any direct or indirect damage resulting from its use.

Under no circumstances can Zedino be held responsible for direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of this site or other sites linked to it. Zedino also disclaims all liability for interruptions of the site, technical malfunctions, or any damage resulting from the fraudulent intrusion of a third party having caused a modification of the information made available on the site.

applicable_right.info: This site and its legal notice are governed by French law. Any dispute related to the use of this site will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the French courts. In the event of a dispute, the reference language is French.

content.credits: The legal notice was generated by Zedino. Images and illustrations are provided by Zedino.

content.introduction: Here are the general terms of use of our site.
content.section_1: These general terms of use determine the access rules and usage conditions of the Zedino site.
content.section_2: Use of the site implies full and unconditional acceptance of these general terms of use.
content.section_3: Zedino provides consulting services in IT systems and software, website and software development.
content.section_4: Zedino cannot be held responsible for any direct or indirect damage caused to the user's equipment during access to the Zedino site.
content.section_5: Zedino is committed to respecting the confidentiality of personal data communicated by site users.
content.section_6: Zedino reserves the right to modify these general terms of use at any time.

content.introduction: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our site. Here is how we use them and how you can control them.
content.section_1: Cookies are used to analyze traffic and improve site performance.
content.section_2: You can disable cookies by modifying your browser settings.
content.section_3: We use analytical cookies, functional cookies, and advertising cookies.
